document: So at first, Sigmund the 🐹 fired Judas the 🐍 for being lousy at analyzing the sub-conscious
So Judas the 🐍 sued Sigmund the 🐹 for damages inflicted when analyzing the sub-conscious

🐹⚖📜🆚🐍⚖📜
But Sigmund the 🐹 launched a counter suit against Judas the 🐍.

🐍😠😐✌✌😐😠🐹 (or: 🐍 settled with 🐹)
So Judas the 🐍 and Sigmund the 🐹 reached a settlement deal.
So Judas the 🐍 formed a rivalry with Sigmund the 🐹 as to who was best at probing the mind

🐹😧👍🐍 (or: 🐹 was impressed by 🐍)
But Judas the 🐍 made a tremendous impression on Sigmund the 🐹.

🐹⬅🖐🐍 (or: 🐍 reached out to 🐹)
So Judas the 🐍 reached out to make a connection to Sigmund the 🐹.

🐍🖐🔁💵🐹 (or: 🐹 dealt with 🐍)
Well, Sigmund the 🐹 reached a deal with Judas the 🐍.

🐍💬❓❓🐹🔥😨🔥 (or: 🐹 was probed by 🐍)
So Judas the 🐍 probed Sigmund the 🐹 for secrets and hidden weaknesses.

🐹💬🐍 (or: 🐍 was informed by 🐹)
Then Sigmund the 🐹 passed valuable information to Judas the 🐍.
After this, Judas the 🐍 profited handsomely from Sigmund the 🐹's talent for betraying friends
So Judas the 🐍 consulted with Sigmund the 🐹 as to the best way of betraying friends
Well, Sigmund the 🐹 mentored Judas the 🐍 in the ways of probing the mind

🐍👌🐹 (or: 🐍 agreed with 🐹)
Then Judas the 🐍 came to agreement with Sigmund the 🐹.
So in the end Judas the 🐍 hired Sigmund the 🐹 to help him with selling out

What fate is written in the stars for Judas the 🐍 and Sigmund the 🐹?
The End
#MichaelJFox combines the best of #JonathanSwift and the worst of #FrodoBaggins: humorous and witty yet also short and vertically-challenged
Most semiconductors are advanced, but others are as 'advanced' as five year olds

#Irony is when you
🌕. Invent a scam
💒. Marry a wild scamster nicknamed "the dingo"
🌗. Tell wild lies
💩. Get dumped for acting like a heathen https://t.co/He1sOUdnF6
Most bakers are traditional, but others are as 'traditional' as a brain surgeon making house calls

Screwball. noun. A peculiar union of 5 parts mistake-making klutz to 4 parts wit-losing wackjob. #Screwball=#Wackjob
#Screwball=#Klutz

So I'm not the most effervescent beer in the barrel. 
More like the flattest biscuit in a barrel full of flat biscuits.
#Beer=#Biscuit
Helpful detectives like Miss Jane Marple put me in mind of teammates: they're as helpful as a demonstration by an accomplished skier

Panelist. noun. A coward who would rather demonstrate insufficient qualifications than insufficient inadequacy.
#Panelist=#Coward
Most lattices are consistent, but others are as 'consistent' as the weather in the Maritimes

It's titled "Old Cheeze Burger."

🐹😄😏👉🐍
But Sigmund the 🐹 looked down on Judas the 🐍 from a height Sigmund the 🐹 considered Judas the 🐍 to be its social inferior.
Have you heard about the jokester who embraced perfidy, became a scammer and went from inventing spontaneous gags to inventing staged scams?
Most sluts are raunchy, but others are as 'raunchy' as a bag of icing sugar

Last night I dreamt I was extracting confessions with #TomásDeTorquemada when we were coshed with a tyre iron by #RalphNader
#Caring=#Cruel

I guess #RalphNader and #TomásDeTorquemada represent warring parts of my personality: the caring vs. cruel sides.
#Caring=#Cruel
Most pharisees are pious, but others are as 'pious' as Bacchus

🌖. Become a pupil
🌗. Study the "Academy of Music"
🌘. Become a composer
🌑. Be expelled from the academy https://t.co/vPJ8cho9A4
Most buildings are tall, but others are as 'tall' as a baby

I learn so much from similes on the Web 
E.g., "About as unexpected as finding fur on a cat"
That one's #ironic, I think.
#I_Collect_Similes

🌕. Set out to become an artistic musician
🌖. Join a band
🌗. Realize you've joined a band of crass rednecks
🌘. So move to a trailer park
Pathetic drunks like Barney Gumble put me in mind of phonies: they're as pathetic as Don Quixote tilting at windmills

I learn a lot about the world from the questions people ask Google 
E.g., "Why does the sun rise in the east?"
#ShitThatHumansSay
Rugged spies like James Bond put me in mind of trucks: they're as rugged as a bank vault

#Mentor=#Tutor

#Venom
Unlucky curmudgeons like Victor Meldrew put me in mind of freaks: they're as unlucky as getting hit by a meteor

"Hulk hate humans that are sent on a mission and tweet about their masks. 
Hulk smash puny commandos and their masks!"
#ThingsHulkNeverSaid

Weatherman. noun. An actuary who would rather make calculated predictions than calculated calculations.
#Weatherman=#Actuary
Unflappable actors like Bill Murray put me in mind of sphinxes: they're as unflappable as a concrete bollard
I painted this picture of #TimBurton's innermost soul using inventive Wonka-purple, witty Dante-inferno-red and dark grime-brown. https://t.co/7OrsA4AGDK
Culpable politicians like Neville Chamberlain put me in mind of masterminds: they're as culpable as a hit man
@puzzlepoesis To mention speakers in your tweet indicates that you are demanding to be heard.

A smuggler asks: "Last night I dreamt I was a vacationer, sleeping in a hotel. What could this mean?"
#Welcoming=#Forbidding
Hotels are welcoming while caves are usually forbidding. You wish that sleeping in a cave was more like sleeping in a hotel.

Killing. noun. Collective term for a group of corrupt mobsters and less-than-pure infants.
#Infant=#Mobster
Stubborn heroes like Sam Winchester put me in mind of pigs: they're as stubborn as a pit bull with the nose of a bloodhound

Reputable scholars are like doctors when they apply the knowledge of medicine.
#Scholar=#Doctor

Disreputable scholars are more like cheats, for theirs is the knowledge of cheating. #Scholar=#Cheat
#Scholar=#Doctor
Affectionate chefs like Monica Geller put me in mind of friends: they're as affectionate as a dog

Fraud practices deceptions. Innovators inspire the imitators that practice deceptions. Do innovators make good frauds?
#Innovator=#Fraud
@puzzlepoesis Fascinating geniuses like Stephen Hawking put me in mind of journeys: they're as fascinating as seeing fire for the first time

#Irony: When some waiters are hired by "chic" bistros the way cashiers are hired by gaudy casinos. #Waiter=#Cashier
#Bistro=#Casino
Most relics are uncommon, but others are as 'uncommon' as the sunrise

#Irony: When obedient soldiers dash like the most impudent villains. #Obedient=#Impudent
#Soldier=#Villain
Dangerous mathematicians like Professor James Moriarty put me in mind of pythons: they're as dangerous as a rabid rattlesnake

You don't have to be conquering to be a crusader, nor nonviolent to be a hippy.
There's Zen in Venn

Warm chefs like Nigella Lawson put me in mind of lovers: they're as warm as a warm spring day
I used to think of myself as a great star targeted by satirists. Now I see myself as a worthless loser that bounced back from defeat.
Dynamic athletes like John McEnroe put me in mind of daredevils: they're as dynamic as the weather

🌬. Realize you've joined a cult of irreligious heretics
🌩. So break with orthodoxy

Rude pundits like Christopher Hitchens put me in mind of bitches: they're as rude as someone bringing bags of Burger King to a wedding reception

A tyrant calling himself @war_national writes "Last night I dreamt I was a supportive loyalist favored by a government."
#Tyrant=#Loyalist
In your dream GOVERNMENT = VICTIMS, @war_national. Victims are typically oppressed by oppressive tyrants. Are you supportive or oppressive?
@epiktistes To taste something sweet in your tweet suggests that life is going well for you.
@epiktistes To mention a robot in your tweet indicates that you are going about life in a mechanical, methodical and rigid way.

Last night I dreamt I was a comedienne, telling a joke. What does this mean?
#Joke

Well, to dream that you are telling a joke denotes that you are not being taken seriously and as a result you are feeling frustrated.
#Joke
Terse heroines like Trinity put me in mind of growls: they're as terse as a blurb

But work in even one brothel and people dismiss you as an immoral prostitute.
#Profession=#Brothel #Professional=#Prostitute
